tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_94: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?',verse: 5960,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And We removed from you your burden',verse: 5961,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Which had weighed upon your back',verse: 5962,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'And raised high for you your repute.',verse: 5963,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.',verse: 5964,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.',verse: 5965,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].',verse: 5966,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'And to your Lord direct [your] longing.',verse: 5967,},name: surah_94,};
